name: Team09-Fire Glider
description:
Stylized Title of the game

A homage to Belgian nonsense, Japanese dogs and childhood Flash games.

Story

You wake up to the smell of ashes and burnt wood. Outside, the subtle balance of climate tipped. Wildfires set the local fauna haywire, and they will soon reach your village. You don't want them to suffer the way you did. You know how painful a burn is.

Take off on your plane and-- what ? Not a plane ?? Of course not a plane ! It's way too polluting and is part of the problem !! Hum hum... let me restart.

Take off on your water-dispensing paraglider and extinguish the forest. Save it, and save your village !!

Characters Frame of the main character running The Fire Glider

A lonesome hero against climate change. His face was burned in an earlier wildfire, and he covers it ever since. He was asked to solve the environmental problems around him and will do his best to prevent his suffering to happen to others.

Hergé with an anime t-shirt with a beer glass and a cornet of fries Hergé

He lives on the island. That's it.

Features
  • Hand-drawn animated player character
  • Hand AND mouth crafted sound effects
  • Beautiful parallax scrolling background
  • Cutscenes
  • Both 2D AND 3D environment
  • A whopping TWO levels with each up to THIRTY seconds of gameplay
  • Hergé with a kawaii anime style T-Shirt
  • A secret easter egg ??????
